text:
Illinois
1964
Television WILL-TV 333-1070
Motion Pictures 333-0279
Mr. Harold E. Hlll^ Vice President
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington, D. C. 20036
Dear Harold:
You didn’t need all that explanation. I just
wanted to be on record. I don’t see why the question was
ever raised, either In the first Instance, or In the
second Instance. I don’t think It was the memo, just some
of our "thinkers."
Director of Broadcasting
FESfb
